page_content:
UKFast

eCloud Vault - Cloud Storage (OFFICIAL)

UKFast’s eCloud Vault, built upon the market-leading object storage platform, Ceph, and incorporating advanced hardware from SGI, makes storing data online as easy as drag and drop. Accessible, reliable and easy to use, this cloud storage solution provides freedom to access your files from anywhere at any time.

Features

  • Enterprise SSD option available
  • Powerful Ceph object storage
  • 10Gbps connectivity to the UKFast secure cloud infrastructure
  • Bespoke storage solution designed for your needs
  • S3 API, HTTP, web GUI, third party application accessibility options
  • Connect through N3, PSN, JANET or Internet
  • Truly unlimited storage
  • UK based data centres fully owned and operated by UKFast
  • Adherent with CESG cloud security principles
  • IL0-IL3 solutions available

Benefits

  • Benefit from both exceptional performance and flexibility
  • Create as many storage buckets as you require
  • 100% network uptime guarantee as standard
  • UK based data centres fully owned and operated by UKFast
  • Manage your storage through your dedicated MyUKFast control panel
  • 100% carbon neutral, achieving BSI PAS 2060 standard
  • Expand storage in seconds
  • Triply redundant data for guaranteed resiliency
  • Collaborate and share
  • Cost effective storage solution

Pricing

£0.10 per gigabyte per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Hour
  • Trial option available
